name: Shrimp Sauce
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
2 pounds medium-size shrimp, cooked, peeled and deveined
1 avocado, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the milk, sugar, mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt and pepper in a bowl. Set aside 6 shrimp to garnish the avocado mousse. Gently fold the remaining shrimp and avocado cubes into the mayonnaise mixture. Chill until ready to serve.
